This is definitely inspired by the anime and manga called "Ijiranaide, Nagatoro-san!" The setting, the characters and their personality are quite similar to Nagatoro. Though, I wouldn't really say that this is better than Nagatoro since this is a oneshot doujin and Nagatoro is a series. So obviously we're not gonna get this kind of pacing on Nagatoro. But this doujin is still really good. 10/10

@Acearea "don't like it, don't..." Ah yes, I've seen that argument plenty of times on anything but vanilla stuff, for once today (rare occurrence) I decide to express my thoughts on the matter on the comment section, don't get me wrong, I expected almost as much backlash for it as I the amount of spite that I posses for these. I do not consider myself worse then those who would this like a sport and I was not arguing wether vanilla is the "morally bad" thing and NTR isn't what it is, a hardcore tag, I just had the idea/suggestion which stems from those who express dislike towards hardcore stuff, after suggesting them to simply blacklist it (which they won't do) to implement a tag which would also label the sickeningly "everything is perfect and alright" stuff for those who, do not enjoy it as much as you don't like NTR for example.  This is a fair site with a fair comment section, right? It's only fair that I too get to express my thoughts, loaded with "hate"/spite or not.
